::Darkfate/Perceptor::

"HAven't you noticed, Drillbit, that undergroud has a lot of 
tunnels????" said Darkfate "Every bot that come in them would loose 
before find my base, and my tramps are turned on again... It isn't 
smart use the same tunnel... I suggest other place... I'll send my 
moles they can open other tunner in a better place...."

Perceptor and the others nodded and left the base...


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Dollen::
> 
> He sees them come by some CR chambers.
> "Thanks you two."
> He gets into one, and starts repair.
> 
> ::DrillBit:: 
> He recieved the message from StarScream.
> "We are at DarkFate's base, because ours was destroyed. Go to the 
old
> Predicon cave. Look for evidense of a collapsed tunnel. You'll have 
to
> dig through a little bit. When your in, the tunnel will lead you to 
a
> underground lava chamber. The new base is inside the lava chamber 
on a
> small island. Hope to see you soon."
